relevant_findings.normal_breath_sounds: Right lung fields with end-expiratory wheezing
relevant_findings.skin_exam: Large, well-healed skin graft on left anterior thigh and scarring on right thigh

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: CT revealed large mediastinal fluid accumulation, loculated left pleural effusion, and right pleural effusion.
Thoracentesis yielded 1700 mL of serosanguineous fluid with a WBC count of 110 cells/mL.
Performed left thoracotomy with pneumolysis and placed 2 chest tubes.
Chest CT showed bilateral pulmonary opacities with a prominent ground glass appearance consistent with acute respiratory distress syndrome.
Intermittent fevers observed; improved WBC count; chest radiographs showed less-prominent infiltrates.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvements observed in physical examination findings.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient transferred out of the intensive care unit.
